title: Hebrew font
content: I'm setting a few pages of hebrew text and need a well designed traditional Hebrew font (Mac Postscript or Opentype format). Any suggestions? Also, are there any utilities out there to help in setting it? Thanks.
author: nathanstock

comments.content:
Check out Dennis Ortiz-Lopez' website. He designs Hebrew fonts (as well as a lot of great romans).   
   
 [http://www.ortiz-lopez.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417083940/http:/www.ortiz-lopez.com/)

Thanks David. He has nice designs but I can't seem to find them for sale anywhere. When I try to E-mail him it gets bounced back to me. If anyone else can point me in the right direction I would appreciate it.
